Description:
NPE throws out after click the '->' button without select anything in xml structure[0701]
Build number: 
2.2.0.v20061211-0630
Steps to reproduce:
1, New a XML data source
2, New a XML data set
3, Use root as table mapping and click 'Next'
4, Click the '->' button without select anything in XML Structure
Expected result:
Warning message pops up or 'Column Mapping' windows pops up
Actual result:
NPE throws out
Error log:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.datatools.enablement.oda.xml.ui.wizards.ColumnMappingPage$1.widgetSelected(ColumnMappingPage.java:285)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent(TypedListener.java:90)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java:66)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:928)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java:3348)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:2968)
	at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.runEventLoop(Window.java:820)
	at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.open(Window.java:796)
In step3 we should use a invalid XPath such as /root1 or/root_1, otherwise we can not reproduce

The NPE was caused by the lost of the focus of the tree element in column mapping due to the incorrect table mapping XPath. Now, if the table mapping XPath is incorrect, then the ?->? will be disabled until a tree element is selected.
